Text: Risk Paris April th Europe Risk magazines th annual European derivatives and risk management congress Paris April Dear Sally Please find enclosed the brochure for the above conference I believe that it will be of interest to yourself and your colleagues As with our other events I am the delegate organiser so if you have any questions just give me a quick bell or send me an email To Register Anyone can register at anytime to any of the events by simply replying to this email including their full invoice details and a fax number I can then process everything from this end Kind Regards Simon Sanderson Delegate Organiser Risk Waters Group Tel Fax BROCHUREPDF
